titles.title: Health Care Tax Deduction Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for amounts paid for health insurance and prescription drug costs of individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/2011--Introduced. Health Care Tax Deduction Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a tax deduction from gross income for health insurance premiums and unreimbursed prescription drug expenses paid for the benefit of the taxpayer and the taxpayer's spouse and dependents.
